articles.title: Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 2 Completed
articles.content:
Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 2 Completed
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 2 was completed in the DPRK.
					 The completion of the large power station which represents another shining victory won in the drive to build a thriving nation made it possible to solve the acute electricity shortage of the country and contribute to the economic development and the improvement of the standard of people's living.
					
					 A ceremony for its completion took place on Thursday.
					
					 Attending the ceremony were Premier Choe Yong Rim, Choe Ryong Hae, chief secretary of the North Hwanghae Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party Korea, Ho Thaek, minister of Electric Power Industry, Tong Jong Ho, minister of Construction and Building Materials Industry, and Pae Tal Jun, minister of State Construction Control.
					
					 A congratulatory letter sent by the Central Committee of the WPK to the builders and their helpers who performed shining labor feats in the construction of the power station was conveyed.
					
					 The WPK Central Committee said in the letter that the completion of the power station represents a shining victory of the far-reaching plan of President Kim Il Sung for gigantic nature transformation and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Il and a brilliant fruition of the inexhaustible mental power of the people in the province and all the builders and their helpers intensely loyal to the Party and the leader.
					
					 By completing the construction of the power station, the builders and their helpers powerfully demonstrated the indomitable mental power of the Korean people who are ready to flatten even a mountain and empty a sea if requested by the Party and clearly proved that no force on earth can block the advance for a great surge of the Korean people dashing ahead like the wind towards a thriving nation, single-mindedly rallied around the Party, the letter noted.
					
					 The WPK Central Committee in the letter highly praised the builders of the power station and their helpers for having built one more great structure in the era of the WPK by displaying popular heroism and matchless sacrificing spirit true to the behests of the President and a far-reaching plan of the Party for gigantic nature transformation.
					
					 Choe Ryong Hae made a speech for the occasion to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid by China-DPRK Friendly Visiting Group
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid by China-DPRK Friendly Visiting Group
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The China-DPRK friendly visiting group led by Xin Qi, vice-president of the China Association for International Friendly Contact, on a visit to the DPRK Thursday laid a wreath before the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong on the occasion of the 60th anniversary of the entry of the Chinese People's Volunteers into the Korean front. 
					The members of the visiting group observed a moment's silence in memory of the revolutionary martyrs who devoted themselves to the country's liberation and its prosperity and the accomplishment of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the guidance of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They placed bunches of flowers before the bust of anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk and paid silent tribute to her. 
					
					 They laid a wreath before the Friendship Tower on the same day.
					
					They observed a moment's silence in memory of the martyrs of the Chinese People’s Volunteers who participated in the Korean War and bravely fought against the U.S. imperialists’ armed invasion.

articles.title: Flood Damage Confirmed Serious
articles.content:
Flood Damage Confirmed Serious
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- It has been ascertained that torrential rains in July did a great deal of damage to people's living, railway transport, agriculture and other economic sectors in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 According to information available in a relevant organ, some 5,560 dwelling houses and more than 350 public buildings and production-related facilities were destroyed or inundated and some 14,850 hectares of farmland submerged, buried or washed away in the country. 
					
					 A total of 673 dwelling houses collapsed in Jagang Province and 486 in South Hamgyong Province. Even casualties were reported from the areas and their residents have seriously been affected by heavy rains. 
					
					 Not a small number of industrial establishments were damaged or flooded, inflicting an adverse effect on the economic growth and the people's living.
					
					 Two 150,000KVA transformers, a 75,000KVA transformer and other power equipment were broken and roadbeds buried under landslides, blocking up railway traffic in some areas. 
					
					 Some river embankments were crumbled and roads and bridges waterlogged or wrecked in South Phyongan and Kangwon provinces and other areas.
					
					 Many sections of irrigation channels were also seriously damaged.
					
					 An estimated 7,380 hectares of farmland got submerged in such granaries as South Hwanghae, North and South Phyongan and South Hamgyong provinces alone.
					
					 Efforts have been made to heal the flood damage in the affected areas.

articles.title: 2.16 Science and Technology Prize Awarded
articles.content:
2.16 Science and Technology Prize Awarded
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The February 16 Science and Technology Prize was awarded to scientists, technicians and officials of merit in the DPRK.
					 Among them were Ju Ho Song, researcher at the Experimental Biology Research Institute of the Biological Branch of the State Academy of Sciences who made a distinguished contribution to elevating the level of the nation's science and technology, promoting economic construction and improving the standard of people's living, and scientists, technicians and officials at various scientific and research institutions and units including the Chollima Steel Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex who completed their research subjects including the manufacture of the UHP electric arc furnace and the updating of the process for the production of vinalon and introduced their results to production.
					
					 The Scientific and Technological Innovation Prize went to officials and researchers at different units including Kim Il Sung University and Kim Chaek University of Technology.
					
					 An awarding ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Thursday.
					
					 Present there were Choe Thae Bok, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Ri Ja Bang, chairman of the State Commission of Science and Technology, Kim Yong Jin, chairman of the Education Commission, Jang Chol, president of the State Academy of Sciences, and others.

articles.title: Anniversary of Xiaohaerbaling Meeting Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Xiaohaerbaling Meeting Marked
						
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A seminar in the field of social sciences was held on Thursday to mark the 70th anniversary of the historic Xiaohaerbaling meeting guided by President Kim Il Sung.
					The meeting held in August, Juche 29 (1940) set forth strategic tasks and policy for completing the national liberation revolution in Korea earlier than scheduled, clarified overall immediate tasks, the policy on making a switchover from large unit operations to small unit ones and the task for boosting solidarity with international revolutionary forces, etc. 
					
					The seminar heard five papers proving the originality of the revolutionary theory of Juche and strategy and tactics clarified by the President at the meeting and its truth and the historical significance of the meeting. 
					
					Speakers said that the meeting marked a historic event which brought about a landmark occasion in achieving a final victory in the anti-Japanese armed struggle by developing it at a new strategic stage and made a great contribution to the development of the world revolution. 
					
					They explained that the policy laid down by the President at the meeting was an original policy that made it possible for the Korean People's Revolutionary Army to win victory in the final battle with the Japanese imperialists by dint of arms and greet the great event of national liberation on its own initiative and build new Korea. 
					
					The outstanding strategic and tactical policies laid down by the President helped preserve and reinforce the forces of the KPRA while arousing the broad anti-Japanese patriotic forces from all walks of life to all-people resistance against the Japanese imperialists, expanding the anti-Japanese armed struggle to wider areas and making full preparations for a final decisive battle for the country's liberation, they noted, adding: This clearly indicates the extraordinary leadership art of the President who turned adversity into favorable conditions and misfortune into blessing with his superb strategy and tactics and preeminent offensive strategy.
					
					Attending the seminar were Choe Hui Jong, department director of the WPK Central Committee, Thae Hyong Chol, president of the Academy of Social Sciences, and officials, teachers, researchers and lecturers in the field for the preservation of revolutionary relics, and scientific, educational and party cadres training institutions.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats in Pyongyang Reconstruction
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats in Pyongyang Reconstruction
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang, the capital of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, has turned into a beautiful and modern city.
					 During the Fatherland Liberation War (June 1950-July 1953) the U.S. imperialists dropped no less than 428,000 bombs on the city alone, laying it in ruins.
					
					 In the hard-fought war President Kim Il Sung unfolded a blueprint for the postwar reconstruction of the city.
					
					 Late in July Juche 42 (1953) right after the ceasefire, he convened a plenary meeting of the Cabinet to call for reconstructing war-torn towns in a modern way and adopt a cabinet decision "On Rehabilitation and Reconstruction of Pyongyang".
					
					 Though busy with taking care of all state affairs, he took up the chairmanship of the Pyongyang City Rehabilitation Committee and provided field guidance to many construction projects to have public demand fully met in the postwar rehabilitation. 
					
					 Inspired by his far-reaching plan, all people turned out in the reconstruction of the capital.
					
					 In 1958 they, with materials and funds for 7,000 dwelling houses, built more than 20,800, one unit constructed in only 14 minutes, by employing a new method of construction.

articles.title: Korean A-bomb Victims Have Bitter Grudge against US-Japan
articles.content:
Korean A-bomb Victims Have Bitter Grudge against US-Japan
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Sixty-five years has elapsed since the United States dropped atomic bombs on Japanese cities of Hiroshima and Nagasaki on August 6 and 9, 1945, leaving hundreds of thousands of innocent people dead. The death toll is about 159,000 in Hiroshima and 73,000 in Nagasaki.
					 Among the victims of the nuclear holocaust, the first of its kind in human history, were foreigners and many of them were Koreans.
					
					According to a non-governmental organization of south Korea, the total number of the Korean victims is about 70,000 and the death toll about 40,000. A civic organization of Japan made public that the Korean victims in Nagasaki alone total 21,384, 10,278 of them dead.
					
					The figures show that the Koreans account for more than ten percent of all the victims.
					
					 Many Korean people, forcibly brought to Japan for slave labor, lost their lives due to the atomic bombs. Even survivors died later or are still suffering from their aftermath.
					
					 Some of the survivors have come back to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 They have been harassed by mental sufferings as they have adversely affected their descendants in the second and third generations from the genetic point of view. They are closing their days with a deep-rooted rancor against the United States and Japan.
					
					 Nevertheless, Japan has refused to make any apology and compensation or render humanitarian assistance to them allegedly because it has no diplomatic ties with the DPRK. On the contrary, it is seeking nuclear armament with the backing of the United States.
					
					 Meanwhile, the United States, far from feeling guilty of having inflicted the unheard-of nuclear holocaust on humans, has stepped up nuclear war preparations near the Korean peninsula and in other regions of the world.
					
					 The Korean army and people are determined to decisively smash the nuclear war preparations of the U.S. imperialists, their sworn enemy, and foil the nuclear ambition of the Japanese reactionaries, who are going for reinvasion of Korea, servile with the United States.

articles.title: CPRK Denounces Military Exercises of S. Korean Puppet Forces
articles.content:
CPRK Denounces Military Exercises of S. Korean Puppet Forces
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet group is staging frantic anti-submarine exercises in the West Sea of Korea with huge armed forces of the three services of the puppet army and the marine corps and different war equipment such as destroyers, submarines and fighters involved.
					 A particular mention should be made of the fact that during the period of the exercises that will last from August 5 to 9 the group is set to stage even ground, naval and underwater firing drills targeted against the DPRK in the waters near five islets in the sea where the armed forces of the north and the south are standing in sharp confrontation with each other.
					
					 The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in its information bulletin No. 962 issued on Thursday branded the exercises as an unpardonable challenge to the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and a premeditated military provocation to ignite a war against it. It went on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the group is challenging the DPRK while calling for "staging the exercises", defying the DPRK's notification of its resolute stand that it would counter the exercises with powerful physical counterstrike. This is the last-ditch effort of those who are running reckless in the war gamble, unaware of what ensuing destructive end it will meet. 
					
					 These ceaseless war drills being staged by the group in league with the United States remind one of the eve of the last Korean War when the puppet army committed military provocations in the areas along the 38th parallel almost every day. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are closely watching the every move of the Lee Myong Bak group of traitors and if the puppet warmongers dare ignite a war they will mercilessly destroy the provokers and their stronghold by mobilizing most powerful war tactics and offensive means beyond imagination.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Blasts Nuclear War Maniacs' Unchanged Scenario
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Blasts Nuclear War Maniacs' Unchanged Scenario
						
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- It is an invariable scenario of the United States to make a preemptive nuclear strike upon and stifle the DPRK any time, observes Rodong Sinmun Thursday in a signed article. 
					 The article cites facts to prove that the successive U.S. administrations attempted to use nukes in practice again whenever an opportunity presented itself, pursuing the policy of strength towards the DPRK. 
					
					 This is not an exception under the present U.S. administration which advocates "a world without nuclear weapons", the article notes, and goes on:  
					
					 The present U.S. chief executive, announcing the "report on nuclear posture review" in last April, excluded the DPRK from the list of non-use of nuclear weapons. This proves that the present U.S. rulers are just same as their predecessors in the policy of nuclear threat to the DPRK.
					
					 A nuclear war did not break out on the Korean Peninsula in the past entirely thanks to the DPRK's peace-loving efforts and its tremendous war deterrent. 
					
					 The Workers' Party of Korea and the government of the DPRK have so far made every possible effort to defuse the U.S. nuclear threat.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear deterrent guaranteed the protection of the nation's supreme interest and security and decreased the danger of outbreak of the nuclear war on the peninsula.
					
					 The DPRK's building of its nuclear deterrent is required by the situation where the danger of the U.S. launch of a nuclear war has become real on the peninsula and aimed to firmly defend its sovereignty and the Korean-style socialist system.
					
					 No one can tell when the DPRK will come under the U.S. imperialists' nuclear strike now that their warlike forces are further escalating their moves to stifle the DPRK with nukes under the absurd pretext of anti-DPRK conspiratorial case. 
					
					 Historical facts and present reality go to prove that the DPRK was entirely right when it came to conclude that there is no other option but to counter nuclear weapons in kind.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Marked
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Thursday dedicates a signed article to the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instruction for National Reunification."
					 The work systematizes in an integral manner the undying feats performed by the President in the cause of the country's reunification and formulates the three principles of national reunification, the ten-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by the President as the three charters for national reunification. It indicates overall tasks and ways for accomplishing the cause of national reunification.
					
					 The work has gripped the hearts of all Koreans for the truth, scientific accuracy and realistic nature of the ideas and theories expounded there and displayed tremendous vitality in the north-south relations and the development of the reunification movement, the paper notes, and goes on: 
					
					 All Koreans should consider the President's idea of national reunification and leadership feats as immensely valuable legacy and a solid asset for accomplishing the cause of the country's reunification as clarified by Kim Jong Il and firmly preserve and successfully put them into practice. 
					
					 There can be no change in the fundamental principle of national reunification clarified by the President no matter how the situation, conditions and environment may change. The Koreans should accomplish without fail the cause of independent reunification holding high as an invincible banner the three charters for national reunification which reflect the President's noble plan for reunification and patriotism. 
					
					Whoever loves the country and cares about the nation's destiny should place national reunification in which the nation is commonly interested above anything and go united close to achieve it, irrespective of idea and ism. 
					
					 All Koreans should thoroughly frustrate outsiders' vicious moves against reunification by their concerted efforts and decisively eliminate from arena of history the Lee Myung Bak group hell-bent on confrontation with fellow countrymen in collusion with foreign forces, concludes the article.

articles.title: Large-scale S. Korean Naval Exercises Staged in West Sea
articles.content:
Large-scale S. Korean Naval Exercises Staged in West Sea
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet forces kicked off large-scale joint naval war exercises in the West Sea of Korea Thursday in the wake of their DPRK-targeted largest-ever joint naval war exercises staged in the East Sea of Korea with the U.S. forces, according to the military sources.
					The exercises which will last till August 9 will be reportedly participated in by at least 4,500 troops of the three services of the puppet army and marine corps, 29 warships of different types including destroyers, submarines and patrol craft and more than 50 fighters including F-15K and KF-16.
					
					 These war exercises are now under way with main emphasis on rounding off the naval tactical movement and methods of attacking DPRK's submarines, warships and flying corps, conducting naval bombardment, discharging torpedoes, dropping underwater bombs and mines and infiltrating commandoes.
					
					 Through these exercises the puppet forces openly advocate   "demonstration of forces" and "strong pressure" upon the DPRK and put them into action. This saber-rattling is targeted against the DPRK and Northeast Asia, to all intents and purposes.
					
					 All the strike means of the DPRK which have significantly grown stronger thanks to Songun correctly aim at all targets busy with the joint naval war exercises even this moment. They will immediately send the warmongers bent on provocations against the DPRK and their war equipment to the bottom of the sea should they show even the slightest sign of attack.

articles.title: Conclusion of Peace Treaty Urged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Conclusion of Peace Treaty Urged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on August 2 condemning the U.S. moves to tighten the sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The organization in a press release issued at the press conference chided the U.S. for tightening the sanctions against the DPRK under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case, adding that there is no justification for the U.S. to do so. 
					
					 The U.S. has more information about the warship case than any others but is tightening the sanctions against the DPRK, far from contributing to probing the truth about it by opening the information to the public, it noted, declaring that its move is little short of a provocative act of disturbing the stability on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 It stressed that the above-said unjust measure for additional sanctions would prove ineffective and result in only deteriorating the situation such as the escalation of military tension and conflict on the peninsula and in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 The organization demanded the U.S. lift the sanctions and opt for concluding a peace treaty as early as possible.

articles.title: Signature Campaign for Korean Schools Brisk in Japan
articles.content:
Signature Campaign for Korean Schools Brisk in Japan
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A signature campaign urging the settlement of the issue of aiding Korean schools is brisk in different parts of Japan.
					 The campaign is participated in by Koreans of various circles in Japan including students of Korean schools in Japan and their parents and trade unions and friendship organizations in Japan including the Japan Teachers' Union and the "Peace Forum".
					
					 The signature campaign which has been under way since May has already surpassed its goal of collecting signatures from 500,000 persons over the issue of tuition aid to the Korean schools.
					
					 Members of the "National Liaison Council of Students of Korean High Schools" made up of student representatives of Korean high schools in different places including Tokyo, Osaka and Kyoto visited the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology of Japan on July 27 and handed to it a list of signatures of at least 117,700 persons urging the Japanese authorities to include Korean schools in the tuition aid program for senior high schools.
					
					 Noting that it is obviously an infringement upon the human rights and discrimination to deprive students of their right to learning, they declared they would wage an unflinching struggle against the Japanese government's discriminatory policy as regards national education in the future, too.

articles.title: Dynamic National Reunification Movement Called for
articles.content:
Dynamic National Reunification Movement Called for
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Commonwealth of Independent States Regional Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification Monday issued a statement on the occasion of the 13th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "Let Us Carry Out the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung's Instructions for National Reunification".
					 The statement noted that Kim Jong Il formulated the three principles of national reunification, the 10-point programme of the great unity of the whole nation and the proposal for founding the Democratic Federal Republic of Koryo advanced by President Kim Il Sung as the three charters for national reunification and elucidated the idea to accomplish national reunification based on them.
					
					 It praised Kim Jong Il for having provided the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, its action program, and brought about a radical turn in achieving the great national unity and accomplishing national reunification.
					
					 The statement denounced the present south Korean authorities for getting frantic in the anti-DPRK smear campaign after fabricating the "Cheonan" sinking case in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 The statement clarified that absolutely intolerable are the U.S. and the anti-reunification conservative ruling forces of south Korea getting hell-bent on viciously inciting the confrontation and war while crudely violating the valuable achievements gained in the national reunification movement.
					
					 It called upon all the overseas compatriots to resolutely reject the confrontation and war moves of the anti-reunification forces and turn out in the national reunification movement in firm unity under the banner of the three charters for national reunification and the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: Korean People's Struggle Supported in Nepal
articles.content:
Korean People's Struggle Supported in Nepal
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- Jang Yong Chol, DPRK ambassador to Nepal, paid a farewell call on C. P. Mainali, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), on July 27.
					 The general secretary said that he would always remember President Kim Il Sung who worked heart and soul to boost the friendly relations between the two parties and the two countries.
					
					 He continued:
					
					 The Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist) and the Nepalese people bitterly denounce the recent war moves being perpetrated by the U.S. and its followers against the DPRK with huge troops involved under the pretext of the "Cheonan" case as grave and dangerous military actions of straining the situation on the Korean Peninsula and disturbing peace in Asia.
					
					 Convinced that the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea would surely be achieved by the concerted efforts of the Koreans, our party extends firm solidarity to the Korean people in their dynamic struggle for reunification.
					
					 We will as ever set store by the friendly relations with the Workers' Party of Korea and make positive efforts for the development of the relations between the two peoples.
					
					 The DPRK will prosper and the dignity of the country and nation will be firmly protected as long as there are the Songun politics of leader Kim Jong Il and the people remaining true to his leadership.

articles.title: Songun Revolutionary Praised by Italian Figure
articles.content:
Songun Revolutionary Praised by Italian Figure
Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Roberto Gabriele and International Secretary Paolo Pioppi of the Movement for Peace and Socialism of Italy made public a joint statement on July 26 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The statement said that August 25, 50 years ago was the day when Kim Jong Il started the Songun revolutionary leadership. It went on:
					
					 He has led the overall state affairs to victory through his Songun revolutionary leadership which calls for solving all issues on the principle of giving priority to military affairs. 
					
					 In the DPRK the army has reliably protected the sovereignty of the country under the banner of Songun while making a breakthrough in various fields of the national economy. 
					
					 The United States has escalated the military threat to the DPRK. 
					
					The "Cheonan" case was nothing but a conspiratorial farce orchestrated by the U.S. to pass the buck for the case to the DPRK in a bid to invent an excuse for igniting a new war and conduct anti-DPRK and anti-socialist smear campaign. 
					
					 We will wage vigorous solidarity movement in support of the Korean people in their dynamic drive for the country's sovereignty and peace and reunification on the Korean Peninsula under the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il and Korean-style socialism.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Celebrated
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- The Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea released the 60th issue of its bulletin captioned "65th anniversary of Korea's liberation."
					 An article of the bulletin said that August 15, 1945 marked a historical watershed which made it possible for the Korean people to pave a new way of development as the master of their own destiny, free from the yoke of colonial slavery imposed by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The Korean people have explored the new path to advance socialist cause centered on the masses for the first time in history and successfully carried it out.
					
					 Great are the dignity and pride of the Korean people who have firmly defended their idea, system and cause not making even a step backward from the path of socialism chosen by themselves.   
					
					 They have firmly protected the sovereignty of the country and the nation and laid a solid foundation for eternal prosperity for the past 65 years since the country's liberation. 
					
					The bulletin expressed conviction that the Korean people would fling open the gate to a thriving nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, as desired by General Secretary Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Korean People's War in Victory Observed
articles.content:
Korean People's War in Victory Observed
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- A meeting and a film show took place in the Democratic Republic of Congo on July 27 on the occasion of the 57th anniversary of the Korean people's victory in the Fatherland Liberation War. 
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, chairman of the National Committee of the Genuine Lumumbist Patriotic Party of Democratic Congo, and Rohekele Andre, president of the Working Citizens' Association of Democratic Congo, said in their speeches at the meeting that the United States provoked the Korean War to nip young DPRK in the bud but sustained a defeat. 
					
					 Saying that a socialist power centered on the popular masses has been built on the ruins of war, they stressed that this reality would have been unthinkable without the wise leadership provided by President Kim Il Sung and the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance and fortitude displayed by the Korean people firmly armed with the Juche idea. 
					
					They noted with appreciation that the Korean people, true to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, have achieved fresh world-startling successes in all fields including politics, economy and culture, undeterred by the U.S. ceaseless blockade, sanctions and military threat, thus giving full play to the advantages of socialist system.
					
					 A solidarity statement adopted at the meeting expressed full support for the stand of the government and people of the DPRK to replace the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty and achieve the country's reunification in a peaceful way by the efforts of the Korean nation itself in the spirit of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 It denounced the U.S.-south Korean joint military exercises and demanded that the U.S. and the south Korean authorities halt at once all actions of threatening peace and security on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 Participants in the meeting watched the Korean film "The Korean People's Army, Steel-Strong Ranks."

articles.title: Story of Kim Jong Suk
articles.content:
Story of Kim Jong Suk
 Pyongyang, August 5 (KCNA) -- One day in early February Juche 35 (1946), President Kim Il Sung stayed up all night in his office to prepare a report to be delivered at the inaugural meeting of the Provisional People's Committee of North Korea.
					 A bodyguard who was going round the building at 2 a.m. was surprised to see anti-Japanese heroine Kim Jong Suk standing by the window of the President's office.
					
					 She was on guard outside for the safety of the President, exposed to snow. 
					
					 The bodyguard asked her to go home, leaving guard to him.
					
					 But she, with a smile on her face, told him that she had got into a habit of guarding the President from the days of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige obra de central hidroelectrica de Kumyagang
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige obra de central hidroelectrica de Kumyagang
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea, realizo visita de orientacion sobre el lugar donde se construye en la fase final la Central Hidroelectrica Kunmin de Kumyagang. 
					  Entre sus acompanantes figuraban el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Sur, Kwak Pom Gi, el vicepresidente del CDN de la RPDC y jefe de departamento del CC del PTC, Jang Song Thaek, el secretario del CC del PTC, Kim Ki Nam, los jefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hong Sok Hyong y Thae Jong Su, y los jefes de departamento del CDN de la RPDC, Hyon Chol Hae y Ri Myong Su.
					
					  Gracias a que se construyo un gran dique en la parte superior del rio Kumya que formo un gran lago artificial, se hizo posible producir gran cantidad de electricidad, regar en lo suficiente muchas tierras cultivables y proteger la llanura de Kumya desde las inundaciones. 
					
					  Tras escuchar las explicaciones ante el plano de la central, recorrio varios lugares cerciorandose concretamente de la marcha de la obra.
					
					  Aun en las condiciones dificiles, los constructores militares y civiles cumplieron magnificamente con sus fuerzas propias y lucha tenaz la construccion de la central hidroelectrica de gran tamano, enorme obra de transformacion de la naturaleza, senalo.
					
					Continuo que este milagro asombroso resulta la muestra orgullosa del invencible poderio de la unidad monolitica de nuestro ejercito y pueblo en torno al partido y al lider y de la gran potencialidad de la economia nacional independiente y la otra gran victoria del pueblo coreano en la lucha por frustrar tajantemente las maniobras de aislamiento y aplastamiento de los imperialistas y glorificar el socialismo al estilo coreano centrado en las masas populares.
					
					  El Dirigente escucho los episodios de buena conducta de los constructores militares y los miembros de la brigada de construccion, reportados en el curso de la obra, viendo los dibujos y las colecciones de obras literarias creados por ellos. 
					
					Por la lucha abnegada del ejercito y el pueblo, se levantan en todas partes del pais incontables creaciones monumentales a ser transmitidas junto con la epoca del Songun, apunto y anadio que este cambio esplendido representa el dinamismo de nuestra patria que avanza a galopes hacia la cima de la gran potencia prospera. 
					
					  Destacando que esta central electrica tiene mucha importancia para la electrificacion del pais, presento las tareas para terminar con anticipacion la obra. 
					
					  Para completar rapido la construccion de la central hidroelectrica en etapa final, las unidades relacionadas, incluso el Complejo de Maquinaria Pesada de Taean, deben suministrar con prioridad y a tiempo los equipos necesarios a la obra, apunto.
					
					  Si avanzan a la velocidad de Huichon, la nueva de Chollima, pueden terminar en el plazo previsto el resto de la obra como han jurado al partido, afirmo y asevero que los constructores deben seguir poniendo de pleno manifiesto el espiritu revolucionario de los militares y el de autoconfianza conforme a lo que demanda la epoca de gran auge revolucionario. 
					
					  El Dirigente se fotografio junto a los constructores de la central hidroelectrica.

articles.title: Construida Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No.2 de Ryesonggang
articles.content:
Construida Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No.2 de Ryesonggang 
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ATCC) -- Quedo inaugurada el dia 5 la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No.2 de Ryesonggang de gran tamano, que es otra victoria gloriosa lograda en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera
					Esta planta electrica contribuira a aflojar la tension de la electricidad del pais, desarrollar la economia y mejorar la vida del pueblo.
					
					Estuvieron presentes en la ocasion el premier del Consejo de Ministros Choe Yong Rim, el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Hwanghae del Norte Choe Ryong Hae, el ministro de Industria Electrica Ho Thaek, el ministro de Construccion e Industria de Materiales de Construccion Tong Jong Ho, el ministro de Control Estatal de las Construcciones Pae Tal Jun.
					
					Se dio lectura al mensaje de felicitacion del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea enviado a los constructores y los voluntarios quienes realizaron brillantes proezas laborales en la construccion de la mencionada central electrica.
					
					La misiva senala que la culminacion de la obra es la brillante victoria del grandioso proyecto del Presidente Kim Il Sung de transformar la naturaleza y de la sabia direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il, y es el fruto orgulloso de la infinita potencia espiritual de todos los habitantes, constructores y voluntarios de la provincia de Hwanghae del Norte, infinitamente fieles al partido y al lider.
					
					A traves de la construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Juventud No.2 de Ryesonggang, los constructores y voluntarios pusieron de pleno manifiesto a todo el mundo la invencible potencia espiritual de los coreanos quienes mueven el monte y rellenan el mar si el partido lo exige, y demostraron fehacientemente que no hay en este mundo la fuerza que impida la marcha de gran auge del pueblo coreano que avanza a todo galope hacia la gran potencia prospera uniendose monoliticamente en torno al partido, apunta.
					
					El CC del PTC, en el mensaje, evaluo altamente a todos los constructores y voluntarios quienes en acato al legado del Presidente y el gran proyecto del partido de transformar la naturaleza, han levantado otra gran creacion de la epoca del PTC poniendo en pleno manifiesto el heroismo masivo y el espiritu de sacrificio sin igual.
					
					Choe Ryong Hae pronuncio el discurso de apertura y otras personas hicieron uso de la palabra.

articles.title: CRPP condena ejercicios de titeres surcoreanos
articles.content:
CRPP condena ejercicios de titeres surcoreanos
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ATCC) -- Ahora, la banda de los titeres surcoreanos despliega de manera frenetica los ejercicios antisubmarinos en el Mar Oeste de Corea movilizando enormes fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas, la infanteria marina y los equipos belicos incluidos el destructor, el submarino y los cazas.
					  Durante el periodo de esta maniobra militar que tendra lugar del dia 5 al 9, planea desarrollar hasta los ejercicios de tiros terrestres, maritimos y submarinos para dar golpe contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea en la zona maritima cerca de 5 islas en el Mar Oeste de Corea en la que el Norte y el Sur de Corea estan enfrentados agudamente en lo militar.
					
					  Esto deviene el imperdonable desafio a la dignidad y la soberania de la RPDC y la premeditada provocacion militar para desatar la guerra de agresion contra esta.
					
					  Asi senalo el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) en su informacion No. 962 y continuo:
					
					  En particular, a pesar de que el Ejercito Popular de Corea aviso su resuelta posicion de aplastar con el fuerte golpe de contramedida fisica los presentes ejercicios, la  banda traidora sale de manera desafiante hablando de la "realizacion inevitable de los ejercicios". Esto deviene los ultimos esfuerzos de quienes estan enloquecidos en la campana de guerra sin contar las consecuencias catastroficas que sufrira ella misma.
					
					  Tales ejercicios, que la banda traidora desarrolla uno tras otro en contubernio con EE.UU., hacen imaginar la vispera de la pasada guerra coreana cuando los titeres surcoreanos habian actuado desesperadamente perpetrando diariamente la provocacion militar en las cercanias del paralelo 38o.
					
					  El ejercito y el pueblo de la RPDC observan con alta vigilancia todos los movimientos de la banda del traidor Lee Myung Bak y aplastaran despiadadamente con el mas poderoso metodo de combate y medios de golpe inimaginables a los provocadores titeres y su baluarte si estos se atreven a desencadenar la guerra.

articles.title: RPDC: muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por inundacion en Julio
articles.content:
RPDC: muchas perdidas humanas y materiales por inundacion en julio
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ATCC) -- Debido a las lluvias torrenciales caidas en julio, la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea sufrio muchos danos en la vida del pueblo y en varias ramas de la economia nacional incluidos el transporte ferroviario y la agricultura. 
					Segun los datos recogidos por un organo correspondiente, fueron destruidos o anegados en el ambito nacional las viviendas para mas de 5 mil 560 familias y mas de 350 edificios publicos y de produccion y fueron inundadas, rellenadas o desaparecidas mas de 14 mil 850 hectareas de tierras cultivables.
					
					En las provincias de Jagang y de Hamgyong del Sur fueron destruidas completamente las viviendas para 673 y 486 familias, respectivamente, causando perdidas humanas. 
					
					Tambien fueron destruidos o anegados muchas fabricas, empresas y edificios publicos que contribuian a la activacion de la economia y a la mejora de la vida del pueblo, lo cual ejerce una influencia negativa al desarrollo economico del pais. 
					
					En la rama de la industria electrica se han roto 2 transformadores de 150 mil kVA, uno de 75 mil kVA y otros equipos. Mientras tanto, en la rama del transporte ferroviario fueron enterrados o perdidos los firmes por el derrumbe de tierra y piedra, debido a lo cual en algunas zonas fue detenido el servicio de trenes.
					
					En las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur y de Kangwon y otras zonas los diques de rios fueron derrumbados y varias carreteras y puentes, inundados o destruidos.
					
					Muchos tramos de canales de riego fueron danados, creando asi la dificultad y obstaculo a la administracion de agua.
					
					La lluvia torrencial y otros fenomenos naturales con fuerte viento dieron muchos danos a la produccion agricola.
					
					La superficie de tierras cultivables anegadas en las provincias de Hwanghae del Sur, de Phyong-an del Sur y del Norte y de Hamgyong del Sur llega a mas de 7 mil 380 hectareas.
					
					Ahora, en las zonas damnificadas de todo el pais se promueve dinamicamente la labor de reconstruccion.

articles.title: Se libran en Sur de Corea ejercicios maritimos contra la RPDC
articles.content:
Se libran en Sur de Corea ejercicios maritimos contra la RPDC 
						
Pyongyang, 5 de agosto (ATCC) -- Segun una fuente castrense, los titeres surcoreanos, que ya han desarrollado en contubernio con Estados Unidos en el Mar Este de Corea el simulacro conjunto maritimo sin precedente contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, libran ahora otros ejercicios de gran envergadura en el Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					En el presente simulacro, que se desarrolla del dia 5 al 9, se movilizan mas de 4 mil 500 uniformados de las fuerzas terrestres, navales y aereas y el cuerpo de marines del ejercito titere, los 29 buques de toda indole como destructores, submarinos y corbetas, y mas de 50 aviones incluso "F-15K" y "KF-16".
					
					El objetivo principal de este entrenamiento reside en perfeccionar la movilidad tactica en el mar, la capacidad de ataque contra los submarinos, buques de guerra y aviaciones de la RPDC, el bombardero naval, el lanzamiento de torpedos, de bombas de profundidad y de minas, y el metodo de penetracion de comandos. 
					
					Los presentes ejercicios de guerra, que desarrollan los titeres surcoreanos con su amo norteamericano con el fin de ponerlos en practica hablando publicamente de la "manifestacion militar" y "fuerte presion" contra la RPDC, toman, de cabo a rabo, por su blanco a la RPDC y la region del Nordeste Asiatico.
					
					Ahora, todos los medios de golpe de la RPDC consolidados con el Songun estan apuntando correctamente los blancos que se han incorporado a los ejercicios maritimos conjuntos. 
					
					Cuando se ve un minimo intento de ataque, esos se movilizaran sin demora para sepultar en lo profundo del mar todas las armas mortiferas y todos los maniacos de guerra que se entregan con frenesi a las maniobras de provocacion contra la RPDC.
